listDeletion.title: Delete list
listDeletion.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete the list "<0>{{name}}</0>"? This action cannot be undone!

listCollaboration.title: Invite collaborators
listCollaboration.firstLine: Share this link with your collaborators to invite them.
listCollaboration.secondLine: Be careful who you share this link with because it will allow them to add and remove items from this list!

listRemoveCollaborator.title: Remove a collaborator
listRemoveCollaborator.confirmText: Are you sure you want to remove the user "<0>{{name}}</0>"? They won't be able to collaborate on this list anymore.

invite.title: Invitation
invite.firstLine: You have been invited to collaborate on the list <0>{{name}}</0>
invite.secondLine: If you accept, the owner of this list will be able to see your name.

deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.text: Are you sure you wish to <0>permanently delete</0> your account? <1>This action cannot be undone!</1>
deleteAccount.consequences: Deleting this account will also remove:
deleteAccount.sessions: All connected social accounts and sessions

signin.Signin: Try signing in with a different account.
signin.OAuthSignin: Try signing in with a different account.
signin.OAuthCallback: Try signing in with a different account.
signin.OAuthCreateAccount: Try signing in with a different account.
signin.EmailCreateAccount: Try signing in with a different account.
signin.Callback: Try signing in with a different account.
signin.OAuthAccountNotLinked: To confirm your identity, sign in with the same account you used originally.
signin.EmailSignin: The e-mail could not be sent.
signin.CredentialsSignin: Sign in failed. Check the details you provided are correct.
signin.SessionRequired: Please sign in to access this page.

searchByImage.dropText: Drag 'n drop some files here, or click to select files
